section.name: CVS Repository browsing via Web interface

body.section: If you're on the DSD subnet, you can browse the repository via the Web Interface.

section.name: CVS Repository with command line client

body.section:
From the command line checkout the nux module via ssh2:
export CVS_RSH=ssh cvs -d:ext:`whoami`@portnoy.lbl.gov:/home/portnoy/u3/repository checkout java/nux
